signature.instructions: Assess how closely the Answer matches the prediction in relation to the question. Differences in formating are less important than the actual content. Plausible methods to arrive at the answer are not considered. Only consider the Answer and the Prediction + the Question, nothing else is relevant to you.

fields.description: 0 means its absolutely wrong, 1 means that the prediction answers parts of the question but not all of it, 2 means its an exact match in terms of content
